query.select: SET @rownum:=${start}; SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 ROWNUM , NTCE.NOTICE_ID , DATE_FORMAT(REGIST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') REGIST_DATE , NTCE.WRITER , NTCE.NOTICE_TITLE , NTCE.NOTICE_CONTENT , TOTAL.TOTAL FROM NOTICE NTCE , (SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL FROM NOTICE) TOTAL ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC LIMIT ${limit};
SELECT NOTICE_ID , DATE_FORMAT(REGIST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') REGIST_DATE , WRITER , CLICK_NUM , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_ID = ${noticeId};
